entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 19. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming south 30 after midnight. Low 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
